LanguageData.ANTI.label: Antimatteŕ
LanguageData.ANTI.description: Antimatter is a substance consisting of antiparticles that is not consistently formed in nature.
LanguageData.Mine.label: Mining System
LanguageData.Mine.description: The remote mining system is designed for the rapid creation of minefields in particularly dangerous areas.
LanguageData.FLMine.label: Reset System (Grenades)
LanguageData.FLEmi.label: EMP suppression system
LanguageData.WPH.label: White Phosphorus (WPH)
LanguageData.DD.label: Dead life Dust(DeadlifeDust)
LanguageData.Bio.label: Bio weapons
LanguageData.Bio.description: Biological weapons are weapons of mass destruction that, by spreading living organisms or infectious microbes, cause illness or death in humans, animals, or plants.
